# BridgeTargetRequest

**Properties**

| Name                 | Type | Required | Description                                                        |
| :------------------- | :--- | :------- | :----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| telephony_session_id | str  | ✅       | Internal identifier of a call session to be connected to (bridged) |
| party_id             | str  | ✅       | Internal identifier of a call party to be connected to (bridged)   |
